name: Oregairu Guess Who Trivia Quiz
description:
A Guess Who game about Oregairu where you answer quiz in the form of trivia, the more questions that you answer the more trivia that you will learn.

I made this game Oregairu Guess Who Trivia Quiz because I am a fan of this anime myself and I love to make a game where all fans of Oregairu to enjoy.

Oregairu Guess Who Trivia Quiz has 50 levels and you can download more levels once it is available on the fly.

Oregairu Guess Who Trivia Quiz
